meanings.definition: Talking too much or in a loud or unpleasant way.
meanings.sent1: She is the mouthiest person in our class, always talking loudly and never letting others speak.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to quiet down the mouthiest student in the room to continue the lesson.
meanings.sent3: Even the parrot found her to be the mouthiest creature in the house, mimicking her constant chatter.
meanings.sent4: Her mouthiest moments remind me of a never-ending waterfall, words flowing without pause.
meanings.sent5: The mouthiest dog in the neighborhood barks at every passing car, never giving his voice a rest.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive talkativeness or boastfulness.
meanings.sent1: He became the mouthiest player on the team after scoring the winning goal, boasting about it all day.
meanings.sent2: The politician's speech was the mouthiest one of the evening, filled with self-praise and exaggerations.
meanings.sent3: His friends found his claims of being the best video gamer to be the mouthiest joke of the year.
meanings.sent4: Her mouthiest behavior at the party was like a bright neon sign, impossible to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The mouthiest peacock in the garden strutted around, showing off its colorful feathers to anyone who would look.
